examplePhrases: Alexa tell spelling contest my name is Jeff
Alexa ask spelling contest to start a game
en-US.name: Spelling contest
en-US.description: Spelling contest: test your english. Give your name and join the contest on your english understanding. Say my name is and your name to join the contest, then ask the skill to start a game. If needed, you can ask Alexa to repeat, she will do it slowerly. Alexa gives word or numbers to listen. Change your name at any time between questions to let your friends joining the contest. Next  features to come:  access to leaderboard.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Spelling contest: test your english. Give your name and join the contest on your english understanding. Say my name is and your name to join the contest, then ask the skill to start a game. If needed, you can ask Alexa to repeat, she will do it slowerly. Alexa gives word or numbers to listen. Change your name at any time between questions to let your friends joining the contest. Next  features to come: access to leaderboard.

To run, the skill uses 1 lambda and 2 dynamo DBs: 1 to store the session, and 1 to store the events. THeses tables are linked to the lambda, so they should not be duplicated by user.
